Python Module Index

f | n | o | p | s | t | u
 
f
formatter (Unix) tools for visualizing and testing data
fragmenter (Unix) it has tools for selecting and fragmenting the original data.
 
n
ne_models (Unix) this module contains functions that manages electron density models readable by :py:mod:`thomsonpy`.
 
o
octree (Unix) it manages an octree and its functionalities.
octree_params (Unix) parameters for managing the octree data structure
 
p
paths (Unix) package relative paths for loading and storing models.
 
s
solar_imager_params (Unix) parameters to configure the solar imager
 
t
thomson_scattering_params (Unix) parameters to set up and configure the Thomson scattering tools.
thomson_scattering_tools (Unix) tools for computing the Thomson scattering across the line of sight

units (Unix.) fundamental unit conversion factors needed for computations.
